medical_history.chief_complaint: Limb abnormalities identified on the first day of birth.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms were identified on the first day of birth. There were no prenatal complications, and the parents were informed about the nature of the deformity during the hospital stay.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The mother had no history of prenatal complications, antenatal drug usage, or any comorbidities like diabetes or hypertension. There is a significant aspect of consanguineous marriage.
medical_history.family_history: There was no family history of limb abnormalities.
medical_history.social_history: The family belonged to a middle socio-economic household from an urban area.
